attributes.action: Say NO to STEALTH speed cameras
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2550666/Stealth-cameras-enforce-70mph-limit-motorways-Devices-target-speeding-motorists-M1-M6-M25.html

Follow the link above and surely you know when you have been stung by a "Robot" that you can offer no excuse to, that doesn't understand the circumstances under which you may have been going marginally above the speed limit.  Ministers were talking about increasing the speed limit to 80  MPH.  Not this backward move.  Stop it in its tracks.  If the police want more money they will have to get it form government - not our wallets!!  Sign this before its too late.  We need signatures!!
